titles: Bothvvell banks is bonny: or, A description of the New Mylne of Bothwell. To the tune of, Who can blame my woe.
notes: Imperfect: stain, torn with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Bothwell Bridge, Battle of, Scotland, 1679 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
